snippet.title: Resident Evil Playstation Trailer (1996)
snippet.description:
I converted this trailer for the first Resident Evil game for Playstation sometime around the year 2000 and have kept the video file ever since. Just found it on an old hard drive and thought of sharing it to the world.

Source: Official UK PlayStation Magazine CD 8. SCES-00186.
https://crimson-ceremony.net/demopals/eurodemo/index.php#SCED-00361
